description: The use of Copilot in Microsoft Word within the Semi-Annual Channel is unsupported and not licensed, causing potential functionality issues. Administrators may find that users are experiencing limitations or errors when attempting to utilize this service alongside their existing workflows in Word. Notably, while Copilot may appear to be functioning, there are licensing and support constraints that prevent optimal use. This situation may lead to confusion among users who expect seamless access to new features due to the integration of AI services. The problem may impact productivity and the usability of Microsoft Word for users reliant on its advanced capabilities.
